import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CheckoutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/CheckoutItem' import CustomButton from "../../components/custom-button/CustomBottom" import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/selectors/cartSelector' import "./CheckoutPage.scss" import { selectCurrentUser } from '../../redux/selectors/userSelector' function CheckoutPage({ cartItems, total, userId }) { const history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { console.log(userId); axios.get("https://react-my-burger-4a0ef-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/orders.json").then(res => console.log(res.data)) }, []) const handlePurchase = (cartItems, total) => { let newOrder = { cartItems, total, userId: userId ? userId : null } axios.post("https://react-my-burger-4a0ef-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/orders.json", newOrder).then(res => { history.push("/") }).catch(err => console.log(err)) } return ( cartItems.length ? ) ) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { cartItems: selectCartItems(state), total: selectCartTotal(state), userId: selectCurrentUser(state) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage)
